solution_line_template: His dog gets {carrots_per_day} carrot a day and there are {days_per_year} days in a year, so his dog eats {carrots_per_day}*{days_per_year} = <<{carrots_per_day}*{days_per_year}={carrots_per_year}>>{carrots_per_year} carrots
There are {carrots_per_bag} carrots per bag and he will need {carrots_per_year} carrots, so that's {carrots_per_year}/{carrots_per_bag} = {bags_needed} bags of carrots
The bags cost ${cost_per_bag} and he will need {bags_needed} bags so that's ${cost_per_bag}*{bags_needed} = $<<{cost_per_bag}*{bags_needed}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} worth of organic carrots
